meanings.sent1: I found two duads of socks in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: The duads of birds flew together in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The duads of shoes danced around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like duads of diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The duads of flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The duads of friends walked hand in hand.
meanings.sent2: The duads of students worked on the project together.
meanings.sent3: The duads of puppies played joyfully in the park.
meanings.sent4: Their laughter filled the room like duads of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The duads of candles lit up the dark night.
